answers.answer: Hello,what did his blood panel show in terms of Fasting Blood Sugar level and HBa1c.There are other causes of neuropathy, which can include spinal compression/ nerve compression arising from various causes.  He should be further evaluated by a neurologist to determine the cause of his symptoms.

question: 79 yr old husband's blood panel just showed no diabetes.  Yet he has tingling of legs and feet, feels like walking on gravel and sometimes feels heat.   What could be causing this? Thanks.
title: TINGLING FEET, WALKING ON GRAVEL, ETC.
